name: Space Hunter (MOY_Has-Audom)
description:
Some mini game I've made in Unity but it's in school, teacher gave us homework to make some game powered by unity and with Flow Canvas!

I used to look for a tutorial but don't worry, the teacher wasn't against it (Well I would give credits but I don't find the tutorial anymore)

For play the game, launch "MOY_Has-Audom_Space_Shooter.exe"

Music :

Title : UNKNOWN

Game: Dragon Ball Z - Solic State Scouter (Remixed by Randell Fernandez)

Enjoy!
